channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Filthy Pavements at Gospel Oak Station and Bridge, 21st June
item.description:
The pavement near the station, and overall cleanliness is extremely poor. Photo 1: Under the rail bridge, the passage is already too narrow for the pedestrian traffic, and there is a water leak that has been around for 2 years and not fixed. There's pooling of water during rains here. Photo 2: The rubbish bin is always overfull not able to cater for visitors to the heath, the GO station covering multiple lines, and local residents. Suggest more frequent cleaning collection here; Photo 2: The pavement is so dirty and has marks which need deep-cleaning to keep up the area.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gordon House Road, Gospel Oak, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain smell, 21st June
item.description:
I am writing to report an ongoing issue with a foul-smelling drain near our restaurant, Noodle and beer, located at 27 Wardour St, London W1D 6PR in Chinatown, London. The smell has become increasingly unpleasant and is now affecting both our staff and customers, particularly those seated in our outdoor area. This issue is not only a health concern but is also negatively impacting our business operations and customer experience. We kindly request that an urgent inspection and cleaning of the affected drain be carried out as soon as possible. Please confirm receipt of this message and let us know when we can expect the matter to be resolved. I am happy to provide photos or further details if needed. Kind regards, Smit Noodle and beer

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wardour Street, Chinatown, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Littering in the park, 21st June
item.description:
This park require extensive cleaning and bins emptied. The nearby worksite workers often have food here and leave empty bags/bottles in the work. Cigarette butts and glass bottles in the seating areas. This park need to be clearly sign posted to remind public not to litter or leave food leftover in the park. Also no Dogs in the park. Small kids pick up the leftover food and dirty bottles and catch germs. Please cleans the park on a regular bases and not once every two years. Thanks

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Albert Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping and waste, 21st June
item.description:
We once again have fly tipping outside and rubbish strewn across the entrance to our flat. Our bin area needs to be contained. When will Hackney council take this seriously? It poses a health and safety risk and encourages pests.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Foulden Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lime bikes obstructing pavement, 21st June
item.description:
More than thirty bikes, mostly lime, but also some forest. Abandoned on the pavement , leaving only a narrow passage through for pedestrians, barely room for 2 people .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 246, High Holborn, Holborn, London
